item.title: v1.0.4 release
item.description:
• Added time spent while executing migration for CLI usage (#42)
  • Allow array in unset query interface method (#39)
  • Fix docker:test build exiting with code 0 when errored in TravisCI (#29)
  • Created init command
  • Improved migration organization with objec...
